comment.author: 50178914@N06
comment._content: The Burnelli CBY-3 built by the Canadian Car and Foundry in 1945/46. Although Vincent Burnelli built no more planes, this was far from his last design. See his early 60's, supersonic airliner and other great designs here: www.burnelliaircraft.com/ New England Air Museum has announced the beginning of restoration of the CBY-3 which will take several years.
